hero.title: About Glodinas Finance B.V.
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner for professional bookkeeping and financial services in the Netherlands.

company.title: Our Company
company.description1: Glodinas Finance B.V. is a professional bookkeeping firm based in the Netherlands, dedicated to providing high-quality financial services to entrepreneurs and businesses.
company.description2: We specialize in comprehensive bookkeeping solutions for ZZP'ers (self-employed professionals) and BVs (private limited companies), offering competitive rates starting at €130 per month (excluding VAT) for ZZP'ers and €150 per month (excluding VAT) for BVs.
company.description3: Our mission is to help businesses maintain accurate financial records, comply with Dutch tax regulations, and make informed financial decisions to support their growth and success.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Meet the experts behind Glodinas Finance B.V.

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.subtitle: We collaborate with trusted partners to deliver comprehensive financial solutions

cta.title: Ready to work with us?
cta.subtitle: Contact Glodinas Finance B.V. today to discuss how we can support your business's financial needs.

hero.title: Our Services
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive financial solutions for entrepreneurs and businesses in the Netherlands

bookkeepingZZP.title: Bookkeeping for ZZP'ers
bookkeepingZZP.description1: Our comprehensive bookkeeping service for self-employed professionals (ZZP'ers) starts at just €130 per month (excluding VAT).
bookkeepingZZP.description2: We handle all aspects of your financial administration using Moneybird, allowing you to focus on your core business activities.

bookkeepingBV.title: Bookkeeping for BVs
bookkeepingBV.description1: Our bookkeeping service for private limited companies (BVs) starts at €150 per month (excluding VAT).
bookkeepingBV.description2: We provide comprehensive financial administration services tailored to the specific needs of Dutch BVs.

payroll.title: Payroll Services
payroll.description1: We offer efficient payroll services through our partnership with Employes, ensuring accurate and timely salary administration for your employees.
payroll.description2: Our payroll services help you comply with Dutch employment regulations and tax requirements.

businessFormation.title: Business Formation
businessFormation.description1: Through our partnership with Firm24, we offer comprehensive business formation services for entrepreneurs looking to establish their business in the Netherlands.
businessFormation.description2: We guide you through the entire process, from choosing the right business structure to registering with the Dutch Chamber of Commerce (KVK).
items: Registration with the Dutch Chamber of Commerce (KVK)

personalLoans.title: Personal Loan Assistance
personalLoans.description1: We provide assistance with personal loan applications at major Dutch banks, including ING, ABN AMRO, RABOBANK, and SNS.
personalLoans.description2: Our team helps you navigate the loan application process, ensuring you have the best chance of approval with favorable terms.
items: Loan options assessment based on your financial situation
Ongoing support throughout the approval process

taxPreparation.title: Tax Preparation
taxPreparation.description1: Our tax preparation services ensure that your business and personal tax filings are accurate, compliant, and optimized to minimize your tax burden.
taxPreparation.description2: We stay up-to-date with the latest Dutch tax regulations to provide you with expert advice and support.
items: Income tax return preparation for individuals
Corporate tax return preparation for businesses
Representation in tax matters with the Dutch Tax Authority

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services

questions.question: What are your bookkeeping rates?
questions.answer: Our bookkeeping services start at €130 per month (excluding VAT) for ZZP'ers and €150 per month (excluding VAT) for BVs. The exact rate depends on the complexity and volume of your financial administration.

questions.question: How often will we communicate about my finances?
questions.answer: We provide monthly updates on your financial status, including profit and loss statements and cash flow reports. Additionally, we're available for questions and consultations throughout the month as needed.

questions.question: Can you help with business registration?
questions.answer: Yes, through our partnership with Firm24, we offer comprehensive business formation services, including registration with the Dutch Chamber of Commerce (KVK), VAT registration, and setting up the appropriate legal structure for your business.

questions.question: Do you offer services in languages other than Dutch?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide our services in multiple languages including Dutch, English, Romanian, Turkish, and Russian to accommodate our diverse client base.

questions.question: How do I switch my bookkeeping to Glodinas Finance?
questions.answer: Switching is simple. We'll handle the transition process, including gathering your financial history, setting up your accounts in our systems, and ensuring a smooth handover from your previous bookkeeper or accountant.
